data.text: @ReopenCASchools @scottyd121 @GavinNewsom I work in a school and personally know of many kids who are now anxiety-ridden because COVID quarantines got them behind for the semester and they are now having trouble catching up

@ReopenCASchools @GavinNewsom At the tail end of an extra long Christmas break, we all got covid. We spent five days isolated then school started back up. One daughter was exposed on day 1 and told to leave for 5 days and isolate. Didn't matter that she had literally just recovered. January was long.

@ReopenCASchools @GavinNewsom Only twice has she actually been sick. We got an attendance threat letter.  I’m a credentialed teacher, she is getting more education at home with me than at school or with their packets.

@ReopenCASchools @GavinNewsom It’s WAY more than that. They are counting being sent home on independent study as being in school. My daughter’s school does 15min zoom calls and a packet, two grade lvls below her, to claim ADA. Today was the 5th time they have sent her home this year. She’s missed over a month
@ReopenCASchools @GavinNewsom Didn’t Ghaly and Newsom just say we had the lowest percentage of school closures? 🤔🤔
@ReopenCASchools @GavinNewsom And now the districts are asking for funding based off of enrollment instead of attendance because they lost so much funding for quarantining kids.
